mapper.select: SELECT /* WatPgmAstaTblMapper.selectTblCRUD */ A.TBL_ENM ,B.PDM_TBL_LNM ,B.FULL_PATH ,A.CREATE_YN ,A.READ_YN ,A.UPDATE_YN ,A.DELETE_YN ,A.PGM_ID ,B.PDM_TBL_ID ,B.FULL_PATH FROM WAT_PGM_ASTA_TBL A LEFT OUTER JOIN WAM_PDM_TBL B ON A.TBL_ENM = B.PDM_TBL_PNM WHERE A.SUBSYSTEM_ID = #{subsystemId} AND A.PGM_ID = #{pgmId} ORDER BY TBL_ENM
mapper.insert: insert /* WatPgmAstaTblMapper.insert */ into WAT_PGM_ASTA_TBL (REQUEST_ID, OBJ_NM, STA_DTTM, SUBSYSTEM_ID, PGM_ID, TBL_ENM, CREATE_YN, READ_YN, UPDATE_YN, DELETE_YN, OF_FUC_ID) values (#{requestId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{objNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{staDttm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{subsystemId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{pgmId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{tblEnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{readYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deleteYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ofFucId,jdbcType=DECIMAL})

insert /* WatPgmAstaTblMapper.insertSelective */ into WAT_PGM_ASTA_TBL
REQUEST_ID,
OBJ_NM,
STA_DTTM,
SUBSYSTEM_ID,
PGM_ID,
TBL_ENM,
CREATE_YN,
READ_YN,
UPDATE_YN,
DELETE_YN,
OF_FUC_ID,
